title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data Processing architectures for building AI solutions (ANT328)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建AI解决方案的数据处理架构 (ANT328)
abstract: Prepare to revolutionize your data infrastructure for the AI era with Amazon EMR, AWS Glue, and Amazon Athena. This session will guide you through leveraging these powerful AWS services to construct robust, scalable data architectures that empower AI solutions at scale. Gain insights into effective architectural strategies for data processing to build AI applications, optimizing for cost-efficiency and security. Explore architectural frameworks that underpin successful AI-driven data initiatives, and learn from field lessons on how to navigate modernization projects. Whether you’re starting your modernization journey or refining current setups, this session offers practical strategies to fast-track your organization towards achieving excellence in AI-powered data management.
abstract_cn: 准备使用Amazon EMR、AWS Glue和Amazon Athena为AI时代革新您的数据基础设施。本次会议将指导您利用这些强大的AWS服务构建稳健、可扩展的数据架构，为大规模AI解决方案提供支持。深入了解数据处理的有效架构策略，以构建AI应用程序，并优化成本效率和安全性。探索支撑成功AI驱动数据计划的架构框架，并从现场经验中学习如何应对现代化项目。无论您是刚开始现代化之旅还是在完善当前设置，本次会议都提供实用策略，帮助您的组织快速实现AI驱动数据管理的卓越表现。

presenter.name: Sakti Mishra
presenter.title: Principal Data and AI Solutions Architect
